issue.title: [CF 662] Cooldown Text With ElvUI
issue.body:
I use tellmewhen to track debuffs and buffs on my target. I also use ElvUI which works like OmniCC in that enables duration timers. The problem is While you can edit text display it is being overridden by the ElvUI cooldown timer however turning that off makes it so my action bars no longer have their timers. What I am trying to achieve is simply removing the large centered duration timer on the icons from ElvUI and wondering if that is possible while keeping the cooldown timer on. Thanks

-Warling


> Posted by CurseForge user Rasca1 | Imported from CurseForge issue #662 | Raw

comments.body:
The ElvUI cooldown timer text should now obey the "Show Timer Text" setting in r630 (http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/files/).

Let me know if it still doesn't work - I haven't had a chance to actually test this fix.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

works great now thanks so much this addon is amazing.


> Posted by CurseForge user Rasca1
